Mumbai - the city that runs on Spice!
A billion plus people swear by the tangy, sour-sweet spicy #streetfoods of India. There is something homey and comforting about them, like the hug of a mother. A report from my recent visit.

Bhel puri is a popular Indian savory snack made with puffed rice, tossed with vegetables and tangy chutneys.

It is a quick & easy snack to prepare at home and is also served over road side stalls often in paper cones. 

Source: vegecravings

@ebruenig * pakora (just fried coated vegetables and stuff) 
* dosas - south indian big spongy flatbread with stuffings like potato
* idli & sambar - soft rice cake n soup 

chaat (street food snacks with many sauces usually)
* bhel puri 
* pani puri 
* pav wada (vada pav)
* samosa chaat
